aboutUniversity.title: About the University
aboutUniversity.goal: Our goal is quality education for your successful career
aboutUniversity.description: At MUIT, we train highly skilled specialists in demand in Kyrgyzstan and abroad. Start building your professional future with us. For over 25 years, MUIT has been teaching relevant and in-demand professions. Here, you’ll gain knowledge that can help grow your business or land a job in a major company.

enrollment.title: Enrollment
enrollment.description: Fill out the form to enroll in our university.
enrollment.successMessage: Your application has been successfully submitted!
enrollment.formError: Please fill out all fields correctly.

education-form.title: Full-time
education-form.text: You will attend lectures and seminars during the day 5-6 times a week, take tests and exams. The academic year begins on September 1 and is divided into 2 semesters.
education-form.secondText: In the correspondence course, you study most of the program on your own. Twice a year you come to the University for practice and the closing examination session.

header.title: {degreeData.data.title}
header.description: Take a test and find out which field suits you best

opportunities.title: With us, your opportunities are limitless

enrollForm.title: Enrollment
enrollForm.description: Fill out the form to enroll in our university.

introCard.title: For Applicants
introCard.description: Enroll at 'Intuit'. Take a test and find out which field suits you best

infoSection.title: Information for Applicants
infoSection.text1: At MUIT, you can apply for budget-funded spots or contract-based education.
infoSection.text2: MUIT offers discounts and benefits for tuition fees for disabled individuals, orphans, and those under guardianship.
infoSection.text3: Admission and enrollment based on current year results are conducted online.
infoSection.text4: The registration and competitive selection process for 2022 is exclusively online on designated portals.

importantLinks.programList: List of specialties for 2024-2025 academic year.

documentsSection.title: Documents
documentsSection.admissionProcedure: Admission procedure for universities in Kyrgyzstan
documentsSection.noORTNeeded: Programs that don’t require test results.

foreignStudentsSection.title: For International Students
foreignStudentsSection.text: Admission for international students is based on the regulations approved by the government of Kyrgyzstan.

entranceExams.title: Entrance Exams for International Students
entranceExams.item1: All applicants must take an exam in Russian.
entranceExams.item2: Some fields require an additional test in math or physics.
entranceExams.item3: Applicants must achieve a minimum score for admission.
entranceExams.item4: Further details are available on the MUIT website and edugate.edu.gov.kg.
